Lyrics from Animelyrics.comShall we dance?
Lyrics from Animelyrics.com1,2,Step...Step by step... nani wo kakusou SENORITA, watashi koso ga iki chi moshitataru ii otoko onozomi to araba hone no zui to made gojiman no kiba wo meshiagare
Lyrics from Animelyrics.comAa...tsuki ni terasare aoshiroku hikaru kubisuji ni sotto chikai no KISU wo demo naze darou, mune no oku dokoka konna ni mo itamu no wa...
Lyrics from Animelyrics.com"KIMI WO AISHITE SHIMATTA MITAI NANDA"
Lyrics from Animelyrics.com1,2,Step...Step by step... odorimasen ka BONIITA , te wo tori koshi karamasete AN DU TOROWAA kuchibiru furesou na kyori de fui ni sasayaku kotoba wa "TE AMORE"
Lyrics from Animelyrics.comAa...kono mune ni saita jounetsu no BARA wa sono TOGE de kokoro shimetsukeru soshite boku wa kimi wo omoutabi chi no namida wo nagasunda.
Lyrics from Animelyrics.comkanawanai koi naraba isso kowashite shimae, to negatte shimau no wa ikenai koto deshou ka?

Lyrics from Animelyrics.comboku ga boku ja nakya donna ni yokattarou? kimi wo kizutsukeru koto nado naku aiseru no ni... 1,2,Step...Step by step... toki no aizu de futari wa RANDEBUU, mata asa ga kite hanare banare
Lyrics from Animelyrics.comAa...aishita kimi ni sae chikazukenai boku wa aware na MOSQUITO sa. "Dakishimetai, dakishimerarenai..." no wa, kowashite shimai sou dakara

Lyrics from Animelyrics.comkawari yuku kono karada, tatoe hikara biyou tomo dokoka kono koi wa tsumi to natte shimau mae ni todokanai kiss naraba, minoranai LOVE STORY naraba semete yume no naka, dakishime sasete okure
Lyrics from Animelyrics.comomoeba omou hodo, chikazuite wa hanarete yuku...tsuki to taiyou no you ni
English Translation
Lyrics from Animelyrics.comShall we dance?

Lyrics from Animelyrics.com1, 2, Step... Step by step... You seem to be hiding something, Miss; I, too, am a good man (Vampire) overflowing with lifeblood. If you so wish, I shall devour you down to the marrow of your bones with my prideful fangs.

Lyrics from Animelyrics.comAh... I softly press a kiss of promise to your neck which glows pallidly under the moon But somehow, the reason something in the depths of my heart hurts so much is because...
Lyrics from Animelyrics.com"I seem to have fallen in love with you."

Lyrics from Animelyrics.com1, 2, Step... Step by step... Won't you dance, my dear, I take your hands and wind them around my waist. Un, Deux, Trois At a distance where it seems our lips may touch, an abruptly whispered, "My love".
Lyrics from Animelyrics.comAh...the rose of passion which bloomed in this chest tightens its thorns around my heart And when I think of you, tears of blood flow.
Lyrics from Animelyrics.com"If this is an impossible love, I'd rather you destroy me." to wish for that is hopeless, isn't it?

Lyrics from Animelyrics.comWouldn't it be good if I weren't myself? If only I could love you without hurting you... 1, 2, Step... Step by step... The setting sun is the signal for us to rendezvous, and when the dawn comes we separate
Lyrics from Animelyrics.comAh... I, who is unable to even come near the you I love is a pitiful mosquito. "I want to embrace you, but I can't embrace you..." with this, I might break.

Lyrics from Animelyrics.comEven if this changing body were to dry up completely, before this love becomes a sin, if this kiss won't reach, and if this is a fruitless love story At least in my dreams, let me embrace you.
Lyrics from Animelyrics.comAs we love and be loved, we draw closer and move apart...like the moon and the sun.
